name: Compact Food Dehydrator, 4 Stainless Steel Trays Fresh Dryer Machine for Jerky Herbs Fruit Veggies Snacks, with Digital Timer | 190F Temperature Control, Great Size for Small Family
about_this_item: 【EASY TO STORE & CLEAN】With compact size, this small food dehydrator is lightweight to move and store easily. 4 stainless steel shelves (10.2*8.1in) with adequate space between their placement, easy to clean stainless steel interior. Just soak for a little while and like magic it’s ready to do more dehydrating.

【NICE EFFICIENT DEHYDRATOR】With excellent temperature range 70℉ to 190℉, this small unit has a higher heat range than many. It may look small but it can dehydrate 2 lbs of blueberries in one batch. This unit is able to do the same amount of blueberries twice as efficient as the the larger competitive unit,because of its size is less expensive to run (less space to disperse the heat). The fan is very big and provides even airflow across all the food on the trays so there's no need to change trays around.

【EASY TO USE DIGITAL DISPLAY】Large display on top is easy to read and controls are simple to adjust, and remembers previous settings so it is a one-touch to start another batch. Thanks to the flexibility to tweak drying times to suit your family's tastes.

【PATENTED WRAP-AROUND MESH】The mesh used in our dryer machine is fully 304 tainless Steel material. Smooth and Flat, and use safe without scratching the hands. And the mesh is thick, high density, Excellent using experience.

【SAFE MATERIALS & WIDE APPLICATION】Made with 304 food-grade stainless steel and premium BPA-Free material, Septree food dehydrator lasts long and works with great durability. Perfect for making healthy beef jerky, snacks, nuts, dehydrated vegetables, fruit leather, pet treats, and for preserving herbs, flowers, and much more at home. If you encounter any problems, please send us message at any time first!

title: Easy to set up, works great
content: This dehydrator is amazing! Super easy to use: The controls are simple, no confusing buttons or settings Quiet: This dehydrator is very quiet when it runs, so you can use it all day without disturbing anyone. Looks well made: The stainless steel parts look very sturdy, and the trays are dishwasher safe for easy cleaning. Dry everything evenly: This dehydrator has this fancy 360-degree airflow thingy that dries all my fruits and veggies evenly. No more mushy spots! Plus, it comes with lots of extras like silicone sheets and a recipe guide, etc. Overall, I'm very happy with this dehydrator - definitely worth the money.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Works great. Very easy to use. The recipe that comes with it is probably translated from Chinese to English, so be prepared because there are some sentences in there that almost make sense but are poorly worded, but it's okay.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2024

title: This is 100% PERFECT! I am so happy I bought it.
content: I'm really impressed with this dehydrator. It's steel, sturdy, and quiet. I loved my old "top-of-the-line" (back then) plastic dehydrator, but I had to sell it a few years ago when times got tough. Things are getting a little better, so I treated myself. This is not tiny, like I feared. That's a full sized, 24 oz, water bottle in front of it. Everything is good quality, from the machine, to the trays, to the silicone sheets and silicone fruit roll tray. Seriously, that fruit roll tray has the BEST hand feel to it, you should buy it just for that. It's making chicken jerky for our dog right now, and is so quiet I can't even hear it. The electronic panel flashes between the temperature and the time left. I had no idea how long to tell it to dry the meat before it automatically shut off, so I just put it on 6 hours. It has a light that lets you see inside really clearly, so you don't have to keep opening it and introducing outside air and dust and germs. You can watch it through the window. Mine was missing a screw for the door handle that you have to attach. I would really like to have that screw because I didn't have any like it, but I have no other complaints at all. Who knew it would be THIS nice??
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I ordered this to dehydrate some eggs as I am overflowing currently since it’s laying season for my hens! I had researched ways to preserve eggs so that come winter time when I’m not getting many eggs, I won’t have to then purchase them from grocery stores and dehydrating the eggs seemed like the best way to preserve them for our situation.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023

However, I was blown away that it took 6 hours to make Beef Jerky in this dehydrator, when the old plastix towers took a minimum of 12 hours. Apple slices and bananas took 6 hours as well. Fruit leather was done in 4. What a game changer!

title: A+ dual filament dryer.
content: I wanted a better filament dryer than what was out there but I didn’t want something huge. The problem with actual “filament driers” is they use passive heat and that doesn’t circulate hot, dry, air well around the spool. Thus it doesn’t do a good job dehydrating the filament.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: And even with “better” filament dryers such as the sunlu s4, the PTC heater blows hot air directly at a small area of the filament, which creates a hot zone on the filament.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2024

title: Efficiency and timing
content: A food dehydrator has better circulation. It has a low speed fan that puts heat evenly around the spool.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: This unit can fit 1 spool or two spools. In my tests (set at 60c) the very back was right around 60-61c while the front was around 57c. A delta of 3c is pretty good when you cram two 1kg sized spools in there. With 1 spool, the delta was only 2c (61c rear and 58c front). Keeping mine I was using cheap $10 hydrometer to do this tests so there may be some slight variations in actual temps. Luckily, temps were consistent and filament isn’t super picky (my PETG won’t care if it’s 58c or 61c).
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2024

title: Useful
content: It also goes from ambient 23.8C to 60C in about 7mins. By the end of the 7 mins, the humidity in the dryer has dropped from 58% to sub 10% (my hydrometer isn’t good enough to read sub 10%).
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2024

title: GREAT LITTLE DEHYDRATOR!!
content: After watching countless videos about people making and prepping their food with the dehydrator, I finally pulled the string and bought one for myself. I received it in the evening so I unpacked and used it after the kids fell asleep. It was not noisy at all. Tbh it’s even quieter than my ice maker machine. The size is a little too big for my kitchen island so I’ll probably use it 2-3 times a week and will store it away if I don’t need it since our kitchen space is limited. But overall, I’m very happy with how the food came out. The drying time didn’t take too long as expected and it did a great job. I can’t be more satisfied for this purchase.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I followed a recipe online to make a three times steamed and dehydrated apple slices that was popular on the internet. I chopped my apples into slices then rotated between dehydrating and steaming them for about 30 mins each for three rounds. The result was quite devious, it was slightly juicy while still retaining all the apples own flavors. Was sad that I didn’t more. I’m planning to use the machine to make dried orange slices dipped in white chocolate which has also been very popular for a long time but haven’t gotten to try. I wasn’t able to buy fresh oranges so I was planning to wait til summer to make them. I like how the box came with a small full colored recipe book that has really good instructions and ideas on how to use the machine such as watermelon, kiwis, blueberries, fruit rolls and meat jerkies.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2024

title: Works perfectly!
content: This dehydrator is amazing. It is very easy to use and is perfect for beginners. You can control the time and the temperature! It's very quiet, and it looks nice enough to keep out on the counter. I didn't want a cheesy, cheap looking Styrofoam dehydrator that made a bunch of noise, and I didn't want to spend an arm and a leg on a nice stainless steel dehydrator. This is economically efficient and looks great. I've made fruit leathers, dried plums, banana and apple chips, and raisins in this so far. It's perfect. I would definitely buy this again, and I highly recommend it.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Dehydrator did not last more than 8 months.  Used once a week and sometimes twice.  That means this machine was used less then 75 times before it stopped.  Early on this appliance was great compared to the round plastic models I had been using.  A few month after using, the control graphics begin to wipe off.  The power symbol is completely gone at this point.  An overnight drying session left me with soggy, room temperature chicken breast, strips, this morning..  I make chicken jerky dog treats.  No, I will not purchase again.  Yes, I will look for some of the same features - interior light & the capacity are good.  The rectangular shape fits better in kitchen than the round version.  May be that I wound up with the bum one from the manufacturer but I'm not willing to waste my time with another Septree to find out.  Besides my customer has expectations & I can't keep her waiting.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2024

Would be nice if the booklet had a list on the index for temperature and times for common fruit and jerky that you could just flip to or cut out to keep with unit. Over all we really like it for our small family.

title: Verified Purchase
content: Got this model for use in drying mushrooms for supplements.  Tested against oven clock - heater settings accurate from 75 to 190 degrees.  Unit is quiet, although it clicks softly when the fan starts and stops.  Heating/fan design is gentle on the materials that you're dehydrating.  Four trays provides enough space for small grows easily.  No real cons after a week of testing - nice design!

title: Quiet, easy-to-use dehydrator with accurate heat settings
content: This was the best purchase of the holiday season. We dry orange, lime, lemon, grapefruit and pumelo slices during the holiday season for garlands and decorations. I had previously been using the oven, but it takes forever to do them in the oven. It also makes the slices darker and occupies my oven for long periods of time. This was perfect. It's the size of a small microwave and the noise is minimal. It had the capacity to handle several pieces of fruit at once. I only had to do one day of drying for each kind of fruit. We also love apples done in this dehydrator. Comes with a recipe book and accessories.

title: Verified Purchase
content: Seems to dry food just fine, as far as I can tell after a few uses. The food takes a long long time to dry, which I’m not sure is typical of all dehydrators. This one recommends 13-15 hours for orange slices, for example. The thing is very quiet for the most part, but makes a pretty annoying little “twinge” of a sound every so often, especially as it heats up more. You can hear the sound it the video I shared. Also I tried to use the gloves that come with it to take something out of the oven at 350F and they melted, so maybe don’t use them for anything but the dehydrator. Overall it’s fine, probably worth the lowish price, but I might try to run it when I’m not in the house because of the little random noise it makes. After 14 hours it gets pretty annoying.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2024

title: Nice efficient dehydrator
content: This small unit has a higher heat range than many competitive products. It may look small but it can dehydrate 2 lbs of blueberries in one batch. That is all I need. It is a workhorse for its size. I bought a competitive larger product from a different vendor and returned it for this one. That was a great decision.  This unit  is able to do the same amount of blueberries more efficiently than the the larger competitive unit. The fan in this unit is twice as efficient as the other unit. It because of its size is less expensive to run (less space to disperse the heat). The controls are much easier to use and more intuitive. This vendor offers a larger 6 shelf unit but the view oval window is smaller than the square viewglass on this unit. And the other units controls are not as nice and easy to use as this one. i recommend purchasing this unit.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022

title: Must have for parents
content: This has been a lifesaver for a busy parent like me! I use it mainly for drying snacks and ingredients, and it's a real champ. The instructions make it a breeze to preserve a variety of foods, but I love the flexibility to tweak drying times to suit my family's tastes. It's compact, which means it can hang out on my counter and then magically disappear into my kitchen cabinet. While it would've been awesome if it came with more containers (because we always need more!), I easily found extras online. Recommend!!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: I have a wonderful, very expensive, BIG dehydrator that I love. But it is cumbersome and has to be stored when not in use for large amounts of food. This little Septree dehydrator is small enough that I can keep it out all of the time. It works a charm! I use it mainly for dehydrating small amounts of herbs and vegetables. It works quietly and efficiently. I am very pleased that I can adjust the temperature low enough to preserve the color in my herbs. It even came with two silicon screens. Very handy. I am very pleased with this purchase. PROS: four stainless steel shelves with adequate space between their placement, easy to clean stainless steel interior, very quiet, adjustable temperature and timer, actually works efficiently! I can say that I recommend this little dehydrator.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
